qas.question: What year did Bern want to host the Winter Olympics?
What year did they withdraw their bid?
Where were the 2010 Winter Olympics held?

context: Bern was a candidate to host the <a0_0>2010<a0_0/> Winter Olympics, but withdrew its bid in September <a1_0>2002<a1_0/> after a referendum was passed that showed that the bid was not supported by locals. Those games were eventually awarded to <a2_0>Vancouver, Canada<a2_0/>.
